articles.author: Kevin Purdy
articles.title: Gazelle Eclipse C380+ e-bike review: A smart, smooth ride at a halting price - Ars Technica
articles.description: It's a powerful, comfortable, fun, and very smart ride. Is that enough?
articles.content:
16
Let me get three negative points about the Gazelle Eclipse out of the way first. First, its a 62-pound e-bike, so its tough to get moving without its battery. Second, its rack is a thick, non-sta… [+4105 chars]
